title: Why Your Intellect Will Not Always Make You More Attractive
description:
Ready to build a network of amazing women and high-status men?

Michael’s Men of Action is a one-on-one Master’s program that teaches men how to create elite social lives by becoming higher status.

Click this link to learn how you can have a High-Status lifestyle now:
https://m.moamentoring.com/podcast

Click here to join the Men of Action community and watch the High-Status Networking 101 course:
https://m.moamentoring.com/moa-community
————————————————————

Subscribe on Youtube: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/MichaelSartain

Listen on Apple Podcast: 
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-michael-sartain-podcast/id1579791157

Listen on Spotify: 
https://open.spotify.com/show/2faAYwvDD9Bvkpwv6umlPO?si=8Q3ak9HnSlKjuChsTXr6YQ&dl_branch=1

channel_info.description:
🎙Host of The Michael Sartain Podcast

transcription: {"text": "Hey man, I just want to let you know I asked you a question and now you're f***ing looking at me. I give them a response and they just kind of look like this. One of the problems is a lot of these guys are very intelligent. So what they think is my massive intelligence will make up for the fact that I'm socially uncalibrated when they don't realize that to be cool in a group of beautiful women in just a place where you're having fun with a group of people, in order to do that, you have to dumb it down. And when you tell them that they have to dumb it down, bro, they don't believe. They think, no, my intellect will make these women become attracted to me. And it's not the case. When you tell the story, you have to give context to the story. And it's so hard for some of these dudes to understand.
